title: Badge
description: Small inline label for status, notifications, categories, and marketing callouts. Perfect for highlighting urgency, social proof, and product features on brochureware sites.

metadata.description: Versatile inline label component with extensive variant support for brochureware marketing. Displays status indicators, promotional messages (NEW, SALE, LIMITED), social proof (POPULAR, BESTSELLER), trust signals (VERIFIED, SECURE), and notification counts. Includes standard badges, notification bubbles, and status dots.

notes: Dismissible badges are keyboard accessible via button element
Notification badges require aria-label for screen reader context
Status dots require aria-label to convey meaning
All color variants meet WCAG AA contrast requirements

responsive.notes: Badges scale with font size and use relative units for responsive typography

performance.notes: Lightweight component using CSS custom properties for variants

usageExamples.title: Sale Badge (Marketing)
usageExamples.description: Eye-catching sale badge with error variant for urgency
usageExamples.code: {{ badge({ text: '50% OFF', variant: 'error', size: 'lg', shape: 'pill' }) }}

usageExamples.title: Popular Badge (Social Proof)
usageExamples.description: Social proof badge with subtle styling

usageExamples.title: Notification Count
usageExamples.code: {{ badge({ text: '5', notification: true, a11y: { ariaLabel: '5 unread messages' } }) }}

usageExamples.title: Status Dot
usageExamples.description: Simple colored dot indicator for online/offline status
usageExamples.code: {{ badge({ dot: true, variant: 'success', a11y: { ariaLabel: 'Online' } }) }}

usageExamples.title: Dismissible Badge
usageExamples.description: Badge with close button for filters or tags

text.description: Badge text content (required for standard badges, optional for dot indicators)

variant.description: Color variant of the badge. Default: neutral gray, Primary: brand blue, Secondary: brand green, Success: green for positive states, Warning: amber for cautions, Error: red for urgency/alerts, Info: blue for informational

style.description: Visual style variant. Filled: solid background (default), Outline: transparent with border, Subtle: light background with colored text

shape.description: Shape variant. Default: small border radius (4px), Rounded: medium border radius (8px), Pill: full border radius (circular ends)

icon.description: Icon HTML/SVG to display before text. Typically used for trust badges (verified checkmark) or feature badges

dismissible.description: Show close button to allow removing the badge. Useful for filter tags or temporary callouts

notification.description: Render as notification badge (small circular badge with number). Commonly used for message counts, cart items, alerts. Requires aria-label for accessibility

dot.description: Render as status dot indicator (small colored circle). Used for online/offline status, availability indicators. Requires aria-label for accessibility

id.description: Unique identifier for the component instance

ariaLabel.description: Accessible label for screen readers. Required for notification badges and status dots to provide context

ariaDescribedBy.description: ID of element that describes this badge

ariaLive.description: ARIA live region behavior for dynamic notification updates

marketing.primaryUseCase: Highlighting urgency, social proof, and product features on brochureware marketing sites
conversionOptimization: Use 'error' variant for sale/discount badges to create urgency
Use 'subtle' style for social proof to avoid overwhelming design
Combine with icons for trust badges (verified checkmarks)
Use 'pill' shape for prominent promotional badges
Stack multiple badges to show multiple product attributes
